data.eml:eml: Two new species of yellow-shouldered bats, genus Sturnira Gray, 1842 (Chiroptera, Phyllostomidae) from Costa Rica, Panama and western Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Velazco, Paul M., Patterson, Bruce D. (2014): Two new species of yellow-shouldered bats, genus Sturnira Gray, 1842 (Chiroptera, Phyllostomidae) from Costa Rica, Panama and western Ecuador. ZooKeys 402: 43-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.402.7228, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.402.7228
